short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily search for Clubhouse stories from Github and link them to pull requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily search for Clubhouse Stories from a pull request on Github, and link the pull request to the Clubhouse story. A search field will be inserted in the new comment field on Github pull requests.
